C_Cpp.clang_format_style: { BasedOnStyle: LLVM, UseTab: Never, IndentWidth: 2, Language: Cpp, BreakBeforeBraces: Allman, IndentCaseLabels: false, IndentAccessModifiers: true, NamespaceIndentation: All, ColumnLimit: 160, PointerAlignment: Left, AlignEscapedNewlines: Left, IndentPPDirectives: AfterHash }
